title: Tyga cuts an edgy figure in NYC amid Kylie Jenner speculation
text:
He set tongues wagging after crossing paths with ex Kylie Jenner twice in quick succession following her shock split from Travis Scott.

And Tyga was giving nothing away as he made an edgy appearance in New York City on Wednesday,

The Automatic Bang hitmaker, 29, looked casually cool in a white t-shirt, paired with a gigantic silver pendant.

Kylie rumours: Tyga was giving nothing away as he made an edgy appearance in New York City on Wednesday

He wrapped up in a black hoodie, teamed with black joggers and orange and black Nike trainers.

The rapper kept a low profile as he kept his hood up while walking out of a hotel with pals.

The sighting comes just days after Tyga crossed paths with ex Kylie, 22, at West Hollywood club Hyde Lounge on Saturday.

The beauty mogul attempted to remain inconspicuous as she arrived to the club around 1am, holding onto her bodyguard's shoulders and was followed by a pal.

Reconnecting: The sighting comes days after young billionaire Kylie was spotted partying with ex Tyga more than once since she became single. The pair are seen in 2016 together above

Arriving separately, the rapper was seen driving to the venue in his bold red custom Ferrari with friend Alexander Edwards, Amber Rose's boyfriend.

The exes were also linked just last week when she was seen arriving at his recording studio at 2am Wednesday morning.

Kylie however dismissed any talk of a reunion.

Taking to Instagram she told fans: 'The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is. There was no "2am date with Tyga". You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.'

Dapper: The Automatic Bang hitmaker, 29, looked casually cool in a white t-shirt, paired with a gigantic silver pendant

But Tyga posted a cryptic blue cap emoji to his Instagram story shortly after, which can be code for 'liar.'

Jenner also cleared the air about Scott: 'Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi!! our friendship and our daughter is priority.'

Kylie and Tyga officially dated from 2015 until their spring 2017 split, but many think their relationship began before the star turned 18.

Tyga apparently threw shade at Travis, 28, in an Instagram post earlier this week.

The Taste artist took to his own Instagram earlier in the day with a photo of himself posing beside his red Ferrari.

But it's what was on his feet that caught followers' attention, as he sported a pair of Scott's Air Jordans.

Over: Kylie and Travis, 28. announced last Tuesday that they'd split up weeks ago, as Jenner flew stag at Justin and Hailey Bieber's wedding in South Carolina (pictured in May 2019)

The couple announced last Tuesday that they'd split up weeks ago, as Jenner flew stag at Justin and Hailey Bieber's wedding in South Carolina.

A source close to the couple told E! News: 'Kylie and Travis aren't officially calling it quits on their relationship, but are taking space apart.

'It's not a firm split. They've been fighting again, but have still seen each other within this last month.'

The announcement was followed by rumors that Scott had been cheating on Jenner with model Rojean Kar, 27.

But the Astroworld artist broke his silence on Friday, denying the rumors of his affair with Kar.

He posted to his Instagram story: 'It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true. Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real.'

Jenner and Scott began dating at Coachella in 2017, just weeks before she became pregnant with their first daughter Stormi.

With the announcement of their split, they've decided to share equal custody of the one-year-old.

The family made their last public appearance together in late August at the premiere of Scott's Netflix documentary Look Mom I Can Fly.
description: Tyga was giving nothing away as he made an edgy appearance in New York City on Wednesday,
